bosk.block.zoo.data_conversion#

Package Contents#

Classes#

ReshapeBlock

Reshaping block.

FlattenBlock

Flattening block. Flattens all dimensions except the first one.

ConcatBlock

Concatenation block.

StackBlock

Stacking block.

AverageBlock

Averaging block.

ArgmaxBlock

Argmax block.
class bosk.block.zoo.data_conversion.ReshapeBlock(new_shape, input_name='X')#

Bases: bosk.block.base.BaseBlock

Reshaping block.

Dynamically specifies the meta information.

Parameters:

  • new_shape (Tuple[int]) – New data shape.

  • input_name (str) – Input slot name.

Input slots#

Fit inputs#

The fit step is bypassed.

Transform inputs#

  • input_name (default=”X”): Feature data.

Output slots#

  • input_name (default=”X”): Reshaped feature data.

meta :bosk.block.meta.BlockMeta#
fit(_inputs)#

The block bypasses the fit step.

Parameters:

_inputs (bosk.block.base.BlockInputData) –

Return type:

ReshapeBlock

transform(inputs)#

Transform the given input data, i.e. compute values for each output slot.

Parameters:

inputs (bosk.block.base.BlockInputData) – Block input data for the transforming stage.

Returns:

Outputs calculated for the given inputs.

Return type:

bosk.block.base.TransformOutputData

class bosk.block.zoo.data_conversion.FlattenBlock(input_name='X')#

Bases: bosk.block.base.BaseBlock

Flattening block. Flattens all dimensions except the first one.

Dynamically specifies the meta information.

Parameters:

input_name (str) – Input slot name.

Input slots#

The fit step is bypassed.

Transform inputs#

  • input_name (default=”X”): Feature data.

Output slots#

  • input_name (default=”X”): Flattened feature data.

class bosk.block.zoo.data_conversion.ConcatBlock(input_names, axis=-1)#

Bases: bosk.block.base.BaseBlock

Concatenation block.

Dynamically specifies the meta information.

Parameters:

  • input_names (List[str]) – List of input slot names.

  • axis (int) – Axis along which to concatenate.

Input slots#

Fit inputs#

  • input_names[0]: Data array 0.

  • …

  • input_names[n]: Data array n.

Transform inputs#

  • input_names[0]: Data array 0.

  • …

  • input_names[n]: Data array n.

Output slots#

  • output: Concatenated data array.

meta :bosk.block.meta.BlockMeta#
fit(inputs)#

Fit the block on the given input data.

Parameters:

inputs (bosk.block.base.BlockInputData) – Block input data for the fitting stage.

Returns:

Self.

Return type:

ConcatBlock

class bosk.block.zoo.data_conversion.StackBlock(input_names, axis=-1)#

Bases: bosk.block.base.BaseBlock

Stacking block.

Dynamically specifies the meta information.

Parameters:

  • input_names (List[str]) – List of input slot names.

  • axis (int) – Axis along which to stack.

Input slots#

Fit inputs#

  • input_names[0]: Data array 0.

  • …

  • input_names[n]: Data array n.

Transform inputs#

  • input_names[0]: Data array 0.

  • …

  • input_names[n]: Data array n.

Output slots#

  • output: Stacked data array.

axis (int) – Axis along which to average.

Input slots#

The fit step is bypassed.
